Abstract Algebra | If D is a UFD then D[x] is a UFD.

Dis an integral domain\nSuppose D is an integral domain and [imath] \mathrm{F} [/imath] is its field of\nfractions. If a polynomial\nfactors over [imath] \mathrm{F}[\mathrm{x}] [/imath] then it factors over [imath] \mathrm{D}[\mathrm{x}] [/imath]
